statements: SELECT * FROM TicketRefundsAndExchanges ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT ticket_id, customer_name, ticket_type FROM TicketRefundsAndExchanges WHERE refund_status = TRUE;
SELECT customer_name, purchase_date FROM TicketRefundsAndExchanges WHERE exchange_status = FALSE ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM TicketRefundsAndExchanges WHERE ticket_type = 'VIP';
SELECT ticket_id, customer_name, purchase_date FROM TicketRefundsAndExchanges WHERE refund_status = FALSE AND purchase_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM TicketRefundsAndExchanges WHERE ticket_id = 100;
SELECT customer_name, ticket_type, purchase_date FROM TicketRefundsAndExchanges WHERE refund_status = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM TicketRefundsAndExchanges WHERE exchange_status = TRUE AND ticket_type = 'VIP';
SELECT customer_name, purchase_date FROM TicketRefundsAndExchanges ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT AVG(ticket_id) AS avg_ticket_id, MAX(ticket_id) AS max_ticket_id, COUNT(*) AS total_tickets FROM TicketRefundsAndExchanges WHERE refund_status = FALSE;
SELECT * FROM ticket_refunds
SELECT refund_id, ticket_id, refund_amount FROM ticket_refunds WHERE refund_amount > 100
SELECT ticket_id, refund_date FROM ticket_refunds ORDER BY refund_date DESC
SELECT exchange_id, original_ticket_id, new_ticket_id FROM ticket_exchanges WHERE exchange_reason = 'Change of Date'
SELECT * FROM ticket_exchanges ORDER BY exchange_date ASC
SELECT refund_id, refund_amount, refund_date FROM ticket_refunds WHERE refund_amount > 1000 ORDER BY refund_date DESC;
SELECT ticket_id, refund_amount, refund_reason FROM ticket_refunds WHERE refund_reason LIKE '%cancelled%' ORDER BY refund_date DESC;
SELECT exchange_id, original_ticket_id, new_ticket_id, exchange_date FROM ticket_exchanges WHERE exchange_date < '2022-01-01' ORDER BY exchange_date ASC;
SELECT refund_id, ticket_id, refund_amount, refund_date, refund_reason FROM ticket_refunds WHERE refund_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY refund_amount DESC;
SELECT exchange_id, original_ticket_id, new_ticket_id, exchange_reason FROM ticket_exchanges WHERE exchange_reason IS NOT NULL ORDER BY exchange_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM ticket_orders;
SELECT order_id, customer_name, order_date FROM ticket_orders WHERE quantity > 5;
SELECT customer_name, order_date, ticket_type FROM ticket_orders ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM refund_requests WHERE refund_reason LIKE '%unhappy customer%';
SELECT order_id, new_ticket_type, exchange_date FROM exchange_requests ORDER BY exchange_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM ticket_orders WHERE order_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT customer_name, ticket_type, quantity FROM ticket_orders WHERE quantity > 5 ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT order_id, customer_name, ticket_type, quantity FROM ticket_orders WHERE ticket_type = 'VIP' ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM ticket_orders JOIN refund_requests ON ticket_orders.order_id = refund_requests.order_id WHERE refund_date > '2021-06-30';
SELECT exchange_id, customer_name, order_date, new_ticket_type FROM exchange_requests JOIN ticket_orders ON exchange_requests.order_id = ticket_orders.order_id ORDER BY exchange_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM ticket_refunds WHERE refund_amount > 100
SELECT refund_date, refund_amount FROM ticket_refunds ORDER BY refund_date DESC
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customer_details WHERE customer_phone = '123456789'
SELECT reason_description FROM refund_reasons WHERE reason_id = 1
SELECT original_ticket_id, new_ticket_id, exchange_date FROM ticket_exchanges WHERE exchange_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY exchange_date
SELECT * FROM customer_details WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT refund_amount, refund_date FROM ticket_refunds WHERE refund_id = 100 ORDER BY refund_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customer_details WHERE customer_phone = '123-456-7890';
SELECT reason_description FROM refund_reasons WHERE reason_id = 5;
SELECT exchange_date, original_ticket_id, new_ticket_id FROM ticket_exchanges WHERE exchange_id = 50 ORDER BY exchange_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM Customers;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM Customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT ticket_number, ticket_price, ticket_status FROM Tickets WHERE ticket_price > 100 ORDER BY ticket_price ASC;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM Customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT transaction_type, amount FROM TicketTransactions WHERE transaction_date >= '2021-01-01' AND transaction_date <= '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM TicketTransactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT ticket_number, ticket_price FROM Tickets WHERE ticket_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT Customers.customer_name, Tickets.ticket_date, Tickets.ticket_status FROM Customers JOIN Tickets ON Customers.customer_id = Tickets.ticket_id WHERE Customers.customer_id = 12345;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_type, amount FROM TicketTransactions WHERE transaction_type = 'PURCHASE' AND amount < 500 ORDER BY amount DESC;

SELECT Customers.customer_name, RefundRequests.request_date, RefundRequests.refund_reason FROM Customers JOIN RefundRequests ON Customers.customer_id = RefundRequests.customer_id WHERE Customers.customer_id IN (54321, 67890);
